name: Northeast Bank
description: Northeast Bank is a community bank headquartered in Lewiston, Maine. Established in 1872, the bank has a long-standing commitment to providing personalized banking services to individuals and businesses in the region. Northeast Bank offers a range of financial products including checking and savings accounts, loans, mortgages, and investment services. The bank places a strong emphasis on community involvement and strives to support local economic development through various initiatives. With a focus on customer service, Northeast Bank aims to build lasting relationships with its clients, helping them achieve their financial goals. The bank is dedicated to leveraging technology to enhance the banking experience, providing online banking and mobile services to meet the needs of its customers. Northeast Bank is also known for its strong capital position and prudent management practices, ensuring stability and reliability in its operations. As it grows, the bank continues to explore opportunities to expand its services and reach more customers in the New England area, maintaining its commitment to quality service and community support.

seo.meta_title: Northeast Bank | Community Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Northeast Bank is a community bank in Maine offering personalized banking solutions, loans, and investment services. Discover our commitment to customer service and community support.

faq.question: What services does Northeast Bank offer?
faq.answer: Northeast Bank offers personal banking, business banking, loans, mortgages, and investment services.

faq.question: Where is Northeast Bank headquartered?
faq.answer: Northeast Bank is headquartered in Lewiston, Maine, USA.
